pullRequest.title: ZK-4678: mobile touch-drag window causing console errors

nodes.bodyText:
also test the window was actually moved by 100px (and not the page was scrolled)
for this make the underlying page larger than 100% so scrolling can occur.
then dragging should only move the window but not the page scrollbar
